[MOLECULAR PROGESTERONE](https://store.dracocomarch.com/en/home/447-718-molecular-progesterone.html#/191-qty-1_unit)
USD $ 39.97
How to Use:
During the first month of use: Press the dispenser 2 times, massaging your face, neck, inner wrists, and ankles. Apply in the morning and before going to bed.
From the second month of use: Press the dispenser only once, following the same instructions.
DO NOT APPLY IN FATTY BODY AREAS SUCH AS BELLY OR INNER THIGHS.
If you Menstruate: Use days 12 to 26 of the menstrual cycle.
If you do NOT Menstruate: Use for 25 consecutive days, rest 5 and repeat.
WARNING: If you are pregnant, nursing, or intending to become pregnant, consult with a healthcare professional before using this product. If irritation occurs, discontinue use. For external use only.

Caution: For adults only. Consult a physician if pregnant/nursing, taking medication or have a medical condition. Keep out of reach of children. Keep in bottle. Natural color variation may occur in this product.

It truly ignites our erotic desires, making it the perfect sex cream for couples.
